post.body: good luck! Working from home is pretty darn cool!
what kinda practice movies? Sad that the only kinds that come to mind is of your kids or 'of' your wife ;) yea I went there.
sending you love sweety!
yea!! Wanna share stations?
tho with milk you can make snow ice cream!! Anyhow how are you fairing up north? It is snowing here so I can only imagine for you!
pizza always hits the spot! Get milk too. I never know why but when it snows I was always hearing ppl were going out for milk.
sounds like a great wintery afternoon! I have heard of Il Divo but am not that familiar with their music.
good to know! I missed who played the female role, I am guessing no one famous to US folks.
That is a good idea! I love cabbage!! I love eggs too! I was thinking of adding eggs to some of my ramen noodles :)
ooh coffee sounds like a good idea. I still never make a cup as good as coffee shops. I think must be the steamed milk I like.
I am one of "those" women. I came to work in a skirt & sneakers cuz I can't walk far in high heel boots & I ordered a green soy latte +pro
Migraine. Feel like a wuss for leaving but staring at my scream hoping to get over it doesn't help. Just more work to do later.
Finally figured the iPod does work and I can tweet. Thanks @t_d_s !! I feel a little slow but hey watcha gonna do?
With all the OT I think holiday gifts will be instead Chinese NewYear gifts
Is it sad that for my more techie more G rated Twitter account I want a pic of my kitten with a computer mouse? Über cliché but I do.
Late to my therapist but I was doing something healthy. Moved desks to a quieter location. Tho it is darker so gonna order two Ott Lites.
Up sort of early but instead of working I tidied up my place. Since my hall light is out and my apt is using halogen. How 90's of them.
Had a fab nite had company. We chilled, watched blade of glory, fooled around, and had the best shower ever (no euphoism there)
Have my hat on and it is raining. It's first test of looking cute AND keeping my head aorta dry.
RT for correct alias: Oh right you need the account eh? @aleecek this account won't go away it will just be less filtered than it is now.
I am amazed at how turned on a guy can get when hearing a woman is making pancakes in a purple lace nightgown and drinking wine. Really?!
My network is running like snails on valium. Anyhow I started another twitter account, so I can be as whatever I want to be in this one.
http://twitpic.com/r6gl - I tried to pose kitten on the cat tree no go, but here is the other one in my living room.
http://twitpic.com/r6fw - The cat trees are awesome! Now is my cats thought so too. Here is the one in my bedroom.
Got sucked into a Lifetime Holiday special "the Christmas Wish" NPH rocks even in Lifetime made for tv movies!
I want another tattoo but am trying to figure out the difference between sexy and slutty tattoos. Any thoughts?
being a bit ill is surprisingly motivating to buzz through my work and get things accomplished so I can leave here with no guilt.
Okay trying not to succumb to a migraine and nausea again. 3 hours to go minimum.
Late to work got up early got cold and went back to bed and hit snooze several dozen times on several alarms. I definitely can commit.
Time for bed and hopefully fun dreams.
I think I have a nightingale complex. I am attracted to broken men. I want to take care of both guys I have crushes on-need to not act on it
amazed I cleaned the sheets and shaved my legs and got home by 10:45. Then again, it was the first time we saw each other in 16 years.
Totally crushing on the guy from HS. Tho would love just hanging out as friends. I was torn, wanted to kiss him yes also just play monopoly.
Meeting a high school friend for dinner. I am nervous as he'll for no good reason. Tho I did have a crush on him and it has been 16 years.
It is cold, blustery, and wet. There is also horrible traffic. Do I say on the warm bus or walk in thrice cold world. It is only 20 min but
all i can say is SWEET!!RT @popurls Mac vs. PC...the Transformers version http://short.to/ez5
Made it home. Boss brought me up the hill and 2 blocks from home. Way cool!
I know I would have had cabin fever if I stayed home but all I want to do is go home and kick back on my couch. even w/o a window I feel it.
YouTube you win again, I am distracted by a parade of Star Trek videos, started as ones celebrating the red Shirt, now romances with Janeway
went to go get lunch at Uwajimaya and found a Hello Kitty Toaster Oven and Coffee maker! I want!
Had instant mashed red potatoes and grill cheese sandwich. Gotta love a nice warm dose of carbs
Maverick has become the couch kittah. Fear him for he will attack, I should know! LOL
I'm craving fresh baked cookies. Not really part of a good start for food costs of less than $10 a day :)
Just found out that Mark Hamill and Cloris Leechman are voices for the great animas Castle in the Sky. How cool!!
being snowed in and working from home, so looking into knitting patterns. Unfortunately much yarn and some of my needles are packed away.
I am trying to come up with meal plans where I spend $10 a day or less for the rest of this month. I admit I am coming up blank.
I'm awake though technically I shouldn't be. Broke down and had half a sleeping pill and my migraine meds at 2:30. Kitties are cranky too.
Sometime the silence of the city is deafening. Tonight is one of those nights. It is keeping me awake.
There is still the painful loneliness though.
It's nights like these I must remember to be thankful to be alive and that a year ago that was seriously jeopardized.
It's nights like these that I am alone with nothing in my life but my cats my long distance friends/ family & work that I wonder why
